column4: if i run 'mount' /media/usbdisk says 'rw' by it, but when I try and delete something or write to it it says its read only .. what gives?
it might be the file itself that is write protected
no luck, again the error with read only file system
if it is anything like mine then have you got 2 usbdisks show up
try umounting it in console with sudo umount /media/usbdisk then remount it with sudo mount /dev/sda then see if you can edit it with root
it says i have to specify filesystem type when I try and remount, how would i do that?
still says read only ;/ this is so wierd, it used to automount fine with read and write
did you try to remove it with sudo rm filename.mp3
still gives the read only file system error
is there anything on you can't put back on?
well some save games if I cant get them off first is all
is it a usb hard drive then not a pendrive
its a sony pro duo memcard in a psp connected through usb
